name: GATE: Killer Robots
description:
Description:

You work for GATE a group dedicated to stopping robots from taking over the world. Your mission: to shut down a factory of world ending bionic robots, by reaching the control pillar you can stop the inevitable invasion and save the world. However if you fail, the world will never be the same.

Instructions:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • To win shoot the Pillar at the end

Credits:
